name: part_008
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】#アキロゼ生誕祭2026 ーLife is GAMEー【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [_tBlI-l8WLk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the song "BANG!!!" with IRyS, Sakamata Chloe, and Mori Calliope.
Aki Rosenthal takes the stage for a solo dance break.
Aki Rosenthal sings "BANG!!!" as a solo, with occasional backing vocals and a high-energy performance.
Transition scene with geometric shapes and sound effects.
Aki Rosenthal is on a life-sized game board. She rolls a die and moves across the squares. Various card effects and visual transitions are shown.
Aki Rosenthal performs a solo version of "Bad Apple!!".

subtitles.original: 言い返して頂戴
subtitles.english: Tell me back

subtitles.original: パンチライン　聞かせてあげる ah
subtitles.english: I'll let you hear the punchline, ah

subtitles.original: やってから考えな
subtitles.english: Think about it after you do it

subtitles.original: 私が見つめてるから ah
subtitles.english: Because I'm looking at you, ah

subtitles.original: Everybody say I wanna be free
subtitles.english: Everybody say I wanna be free

subtitles.original: 研ぎ澄ます　五感全部黙らす ah
subtitles.english: Hone all five senses and shut them up, ah

subtitles.original: 目覚ませ起きろ
subtitles.english: Wake up, get up

subtitles.original: Wake up wake up
subtitles.english: Wake up wake up

subtitles.original: いっとけなら今だ
subtitles.english: Go for it, it's now

subtitles.original: ねえいっとけなら今だ
subtitles.english: Hey, go for it, it's now

subtitles.original: 生まれたその時から選んできたんだ
subtitles.english: I've been choosing since the moment I was born

subtitles.original: 思い出せ　私は私だ
subtitles.english: Remember, I am who I am

subtitles.original: 不可能なことなど何ひとつもないさじゃないの
subtitles.english: There's nothing impossible, isn't that right?

subtitles.original: 生まれたその時から選んできたんだ
subtitles.english: I've been choosing since the moment I was born

subtitles.original: 思い出せ　あなたはあなただ
subtitles.english: Remember, you are who you are

subtitles.original: 不可能なことなど何ひとつもないさじゃないの
subtitles.english: There's nothing impossible, isn't that right?

subtitles.original: なりたい自分に
subtitles.english: To the person you want to be

subtitles.original: 好き嫌い　正しい I don't care フットペダル
subtitles.english: Like, dislike, correct, I don't care, foot pedal

subtitles.original: 好き嫌い　正しい I don't care フットペダル
subtitles.english: Like, dislike, correct, I don't care, foot pedal

subtitles.original: Bad Apple!!
subtitles.english: Bad Apple!!

subtitles.original: 流れてく時の中ででも　けだるさが
subtitles.english: Even in the flowing time, listlessness

subtitles.original: ほらグルグル回って　私から離れる
subtitles.english: Look, it goes around and around, leaving me

subtitles.original: 心も見えないわ　そう知らない
subtitles.english: I can't even see my heart, I don't know

subtitles.original: 自分から動くこともなく　時の隙間に
subtitles.english: Without moving on my own, in the gaps of time

subtitles.original: 流され続けて　知らないわ　周りのことなど
subtitles.english: Kept being swept away, I don't know about my surroundings

subtitles.original: 私は私　それだけ
subtitles.english: I am me, that's all

subtitles.original: 夢見てる　なにも見てない　語るも無駄な
subtitles.english: I'm dreaming, seeing nothing, it's useless to talk

subtitles.original: 自分の言葉　悲しむなんて　疲れるだけよ
subtitles.english: My own words, grieving only makes me tired

subtitles.original: なにも感じず過ごせばいいの
subtitles.english: I should just spend my time without feeling anything

subtitles.original: 戸惑う言葉　与えられても　自分の心
subtitles.english: Even if given confusing words, my own heart

subtitles.original: ただ上の空　もし私から　動くのならば
subtitles.english: Is just absent-minded, if I were to move

subtitles.original: すべて変えるのなら　黒にするわ
subtitles.english: If I were to change everything, I'd make it black

subtitles.original: こんな自分に　未来はあるの？　こんな世界に
subtitles.english: Is there a future for a self like this? In such a world

subtitles.original: 私はいるの？　今切ないの？　今悲しいの？
subtitles.english: Do I exist? Am I pained now? Am I sad now?

subtitles.original: 自分のことも　わからないまま
subtitles.english: Without even knowing myself

subtitles.original: 歩むことさえ　疲れるだけよ　人のことなど
subtitles.english: Even walking only makes me tired, as for others

subtitles.original: 知りもしないわ　こんな私も　変われるのなら
subtitles.english: I don't even know them, if even I could change

subtitles.original: もし変われるのなら　白になるわ
subtitles.english: If I could change, I'd become white

subtitles.original: 流れてく時の中ででも　けだるさが
subtitles.english: Even in the flowing time, listlessness

subtitles.original: ほらグルグル回って　私から離れる
subtitles.english: Look, it goes around and around, leaving me

subtitles.original: 心も見えないわ　そう知らない
subtitles.english: I can't even see my heart, I don't know

subtitles.original: 自分から動くこともなく　時の隙間に
subtitles.english: Without moving on my own, in the gaps of time

subtitles.original: 流され続けて　知らないわ　周りのことなど
subtitles.english: Kept being swept away, I don't know about my surroundings

subtitles.original: 私は私　それだけ
subtitles.english: I am me, that's all

subtitles.original: 夢見てる　なにも見てない　語るも無駄な
subtitles.english: I'm dreaming, seeing nothing, it's useless to talk

subtitles.english: My own words, grieving only makes me tired
